Pinnacle Studio Ultimate HD Collection - a popular video editing program with support for HD video, including Blu-ray and AVCHD. The program has a simple and intuitive interface through which you can create high-quality videos with various effects, transitions and animations, and stunning Dolby Digital 5.1 sound. The result of his creations, you can upload to YouTube or burn it to DVD and portable devices. The program includes professional tools for titling, color correction, lighting and special effects. The program's interface is multilingual and has the support of the Spanish language.

Making Movies with Studio is done in three stages: 
1. Import. Download the source video in the PC's hard disk. Can serve as sources of analog video recorders (standard 8 mm, VHS, etc), digital video recorders (DV, Digital8), memory cards or other media file communication and real-time video received from camera, camcorder or webcam. 
2. Edition. Put the video in the desired sequence, rearrange scenes, and removing unnecessary. Add visual effects and transitions, titles and graphics and additional sound, including sound effects and background music. When recording DVD, Blu-ray, VCD, create interactive menus that allow viewers to customize the view settings. 
3. Derivation of the film. Upon completion of the project, production of the recording of the final film in a format suitable for the selected media: videotape, VCD, CD, S-VCD-ROM, DVD-ROM, AVI, MPEG, RealVideo, Windows Media, etc.
